short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View the current page's source code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Page Source is a simple and efficient Chrome extension that allows users to easily view the source code of any webpage with a single click. By clicking the extension icon, users can instantly open the page source in a new tab, mimicking the functionality of the "View Page Source" shortcut (Ctrl + U) or the right-click context menu option. The extension is designed with user experience in mind, featuring distinct icons for regular and incognito browsing modes, ensuring seamless integration into your browsing routine. With no unnecessary permissions and a straightforward interface, View Page Source enhances your web development workflow and allows for quick access to the underlying HTML and JavaScript of any site you visit.
